phrases: Do you really think he will chase you forever?

If you disconnect from Yano's feelings now, it will be too late.
It will be too late.

Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 24 ...
Now that I think about it, there are not many days left in the year.
Nana, if you do not hurry and make up with Yano, you know...
What?
It is Christmas next month!
Hey, what are you going to get for him this year?
That is right...
I need to start spending less and save up for a present.
Even though we are in the middle of a fight, Christmas is still stuck in my mind...
Results from the Cancer Screening Examination
We noticed that you had hemorrhaging from your colon Please have a more thorough examination at the nearest general hospital immediately.
City Cancer Center
hemorrhaging from your colon
Mom... a notice from the hospital.
Did you see it?
Ah, just another one like they sent last year.
Remember how I went for another exam, and they removed all of those benign polyps?
They left some in because they were too small, so they are probably acting up again.
I see...
But do not you think it would be a good idea to get checked out again?
I guess so.
But we are so busy with all of this moving business right now...
Once we get to Tokyo, I will take some time and go in for another examination.
Man, am I beat.
We are moving around Christmastime?
Hey...
Will you really be all right?
About what?
Being on your own.
Oh, stop it!
It is not like I am a child.
You are pretty cheeky, worrying about your mother like that.
By the way... what is your pay going to be?
I will be fine!
How much is it?
Net Income 200,000 yen
Net Income 200,000 yen
Net Income 200,000 yen
Net Income 200,000 yen
Net Income 200,000 yen
Net Income 200,000 yen
And how much is apartment rent and living expense...?
If I economize, 120,000 yen/mo.
If I economize, 120,000 yen/mo.
If I economize, 120,000 yen/mo.
If I economize, 120,000 yen/mo.
If I economize, 120,000 yen/mo.
If I economize, 120,000 yen/mo.
You also have to add in insurance and property taxes, do not you?
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
Combining your tuition with everything else, hhhhhh60,000 yen/mo.
And my allowance...?
That man said he did not need me to pay for his living expenses, so 30,000 yen should do the trick.
Net Income 200,000 yen/mo.
Apartment Living Expenses 120,000 yen
Insurance, Tuition 60,000 yen
Allowance 30,000 yen
Total: 210,000 yen
You are in the red!
Do not tell me it will do the trick!
I have my savings account, and I can also work part-time.
I will work part-time, so do not bother with my allowance.
No.
You need to give your undivided attention to college entrance exams.
I will come up with the money somehow if there is an emergency.
And it is not like I will have a rough time straight from the start.
You cannot take money from your bank account!
I will take care of my tuition.
Do not be ridiculous.
If you drop out of college because of the extra work, you will be confusing your priorities.
Please... just leave my business to me.
You do not have to worry about a thing.
I am already uneasy enough, leaving you here where I cannot keep an eye on you.
So please do not say things like you will get a part-time job.
Information for Applicants
You will definitely find a job perfect for you.
Part-Time Information Magazine
Your mom was against it, was not she?
You should stop this.
I understand how you feel, but maybe not worrying her is another way of being a good son?
Then going where she can keep an eye on me would be considered being a good son, would not it?
H-Hey, once December comes around, there is going to be an opening at my liquor store.
We will need some extra hands...
I will ask my dad for you.
He might even increase your hourly wage.
How... about it?
Hey, do not tell me you plan on...
Hey, wait up, Moto!
Hey!
Are you actually thinking of going with your mom?!
Did not you say you could not leave Takahashi behind the other day?!
Of course I will.
Why do I have to keep giving you those chances right before my eyes?
There is so much confusion right now...
With women, if you are not by their sides, you do not know where they will go running off to.
I have had enough of this regret.
He is lying.
He is definitely lying!
He is definitely lost.
Is not it fine?
If he wants to go, let him go.
Why do you have to butt in?
What is up with you?
That is pretty cold.
How can you say that when you always worked him to the bone as a kid...
Pushing him around, making him your little servant, making him give you massages...
I cannot believe you.
He was the one who wanted to massage me, so I let him.
Yeah, I know.
He told me you tricked him into doing it, though.
What a moron.
I wonder what he was expecting?
He sure is a moron.
Though I can sorta understand how he felt.
Anyway, putting that aside...
The one I do not understand the most is you.
If Moto leaves, is not it your chance to make her yours once and for all?
Have you forgotten that he is your rival?
I do not want Takahashi if it is going to be like this.
I do not want her to come to me because he is no good for her...
And I do not want her to come to me because she is lonely...
I want Takahashi to say that I am the one meant for her.
What is going on in here?
It looks like Moto's headed to Tokyo.
Hey, do not go deciding that all by yourself.
Oh, my.
So she is, after all.
Ayaka, would you put on some tea for me?
What do you mean, so she is?
You know...
That boy's mother always looks so flighty and up in the air.
It is like she does not have her feet on the ground.
Or like she became an adult while still being a girl on the inside.
Though in a way, I am kind of jealous.
Thanks.
Though Moto's kept a pretty firm grip on himself, do not you think?
Yes... but that is a pretty common pattern, where the child becomes much more steady if the parents are unstable.
From what I hear, Moto's mom is supposedly a lot like that type of girl...
That type?
What type?
Like his dead girlfriend.
With women, if you are not by their sides, you do not know where they will go running off to.
This is bad... he seriously...
Takeuchi-kun?
What is the matter?
It is cold out, so come inside.
Hurry and make up with him!
Stop him from going to Tokyo!
Huh?
Tokyo...?
This is not the time to be anxious!
What is up with saying, if we split up, things will fall apart?
Do not say insubstantial crap like that!
It is up to you if you want things to fall apart, but going about it this way is just wrong!
Anyway, hurry up and talk to him!
Yano's... going to leave?

I did not notice at all that Yano was going through so much right now...
Nana, have you written down your choices yet?
Ah, yeah...
But...
Let me see, let me see!
Questionnaire
Field of Study
College Name
Year 2, Class 7
K University
Economics
Yano Motoharu
K University?
What is your second choice?
I do not have one.
I do not plan on going anywhere else.
You are pretty set on that.
What if you do not get accepted?
As if that would happen.
So you are with guys headed off to Tokyo, huh?
I want to go to Sapporo, though it looks like about half our class wants to leave Hokkaido.
Hey.
Can you see what she wrote?
Huh?
No!
From what I remember, she said she was going to apply to at least one Tokyo school the last time we talked about college...
I have become a little uneasy about all of this.
If she goes to college in Tokyo, I can say we would only be apart for a year, and it would be easy to persuade her...
What am I thinking?
It should be something different right now.
Ask her yourself.
Yeah.
Takahashi.
What college do you plan on going to?
There is something more important than that right now, is not there?
Umm... you said your parents did not want you going to a college in Tokyo, did not you?
But you wanted to convince them to let you...
Because there were not too many schools you wanted to go to here in Hokkaido...
Right?
And since you are so good at English, you said you wanted to study English literature, right?
And also, since you wanted to go to a school that stands out...
I know.
There is always A University, College of R, and S University.
They are all in Tokyo, right?
Am I right?
Wrong.
Yano, I have changed what school I want to go to.
Could not you convince your parents?
Why did not you talk to me about that even once?
You did not tell me anything either, Yano...
Even if your school will not be in Tokyo, everything's all better now that you are not with me anymore?
Yano?!
Why cannot I express my feelings...?
Even though I love him so much, I always say the opposite...
I really want to tell him I love him, but I am afraid he might feel differently now...
You want to affirm them, right?
Yeah.
Because you love him, you become anxious, right?
Yeah.
Then why not just come right out and tell him that you love him?
That he is more important to you than anyone else.
That you do not want him to go.
Yeah... yeah...
I really...
I because so much trouble for Yano, make him uneasy, hurt him...
I always wanted to tell him what is most important.
That I am the one who is wrong...
But I do not want this, Yano.
Do not go, Yano.
YOU-Umm, I am sorry for stopping by so late today.
I had some urgent business...
There is something I have to talk about with Yano-kun right now.
Here you go.
I think he should be back soon.
Y-Yes, thank you.
So he is out...
Clothes
Cloth es 2
Books!
Do you like sweet potatoes?
I made one.
Ah... thank you.
Since I came here to stop Yano...
I am sorry.
Memorandum
W-What is this?
Electricity
Kerosene
Go to Moriishi Oil and
Charged directly from bank account
Gas Water
If you do not write those things down, boys will not have a clue about what to do with the house.
To Motoharu
Some things I would really like you to do
Do not go out on any outings
Eat as much as you can in the
house with what we have here
Do not worry if you ever run out of money
Oh, he is back.
Yano, I heard your mom's getting divorced.
I am sorry for not noticing.
I was being too selfish and could not realize how lost and confused you were.
I am not lost or confused.
I have no intention of splitting up with you.
Yano...
I think I was just blinded by my happiness.
My complaints and uneasiness about all the small things so far...
And if we were apart, they would all go away...
I really love you, Yano.
I really, really love you too, Takahashi.
Which is why I absolutely will not split up with you.
Ah, see?
If we are honest with each other, we can hear each other perfectly.
I can see them...
They are so clear...
Yano's feelings...
I can say it...
Yano... if she needs your help, then go with your mom.
Do not worry about me, and really think about it.
Right now, you really need to think about what is important to you and what you should do.
I will be all right.
No matter what choice you make, I will wait.
We cannot break away from each other so easily anymore.
I am different from Nana-san.
So from now, I will wait until you come up with an answer.
No matter which Yano chooses, I want to believe in him.
From now, let us think about what is going to happen in a year.
For the most part, I was able to convince my parents.
They said it was okay to apply to at most one school in Tokyo.
But you said you changed which school you wanted to go to?
You wanted to go to one in Tokyo, did not you?
J University?
Foreign languages?
It is my dream!
Do you have a problem with that?
C-Calm down.
How were your latest T-scores?
Japanese, 59...
World History, 60...
English, 64...
Total, 61 ...
It will be really tough if you do not at least get over a 70...
10 of the applicants passed...
If you fail, you will be going to Sapporo!
I know...
Then are you going to change what school you want to go to?
No...
Then why do not you come up with another fallback school?
That is impossible...
Takahashi... if you fail, you are going to Sapporo.
Do you really understand what that means?
I am not going to Tokyo university for you, I am going for me.
And if my future path intersects with yours, I will be very happy.
I really want to do it.
Yeah.
I will definitely pass and go to Tokyo with you, Yano.
T-There is still a year, s-so it should be fine.
Right?
Hey... others should be the ones saying that to you!
Yeah...
It is good to have aspirations to go there, and even though it seems reckless...
Yeah, yeah!
I will repeat your own words to you!
Pass no matter what.
Yeah.
Sign: 1st choice J University 2nd choice F college for W...
That is pretty rude.
S-Sorry.
But her 1 st and 2nd choices are way too high for her.
What is up with that?
I had no idea that Takahashi was a gambler like this.
At first, she told me she was not going to Tokyo for me, and it shocked me for a second, but...
Sign: J University
When she told me she was going for herself...
I felt like I could believe in her.
That Takahashi might be able to make such a miracle happen.
You are a pretty big gambler too, huh?
I guess it is her influence on me.
Takahashi's really strong, is not she?
It seems like I am the more effeminate one.
So, are you still undecided?
Yeah.
I will also believe in whatever you choose.
Either way, I am off to Tokyo, too.
Were not you trying to get into the politics and economics program at W university?
Yep.
But the real problem here is what she is going to do if she fails.
Will she really end up at Sapporo?
Even for me, that would be a little troublesome...
That is true... it is like she has not thought of anything but passing.
It is like she is the type who runs straight at something without looking back...
But do not you think it is bad if you do not glance back once in a while?
But she will be fine.
Because I will protect her.
Sign: 1 K University
I like gambling... but I am going to be a little more careful.
Keep this a secret from Takahashi, though.
Sign: 2 College of H
The College of H?
A college in Sapporo?
I will put some insurance on this.
This might be a first for me.

Takahashi.

Be here... look...
Be here... at me...

Episode 25 Preview...
I had no idea what it meant for Yano to leave...
What do you want for Christmas this year?
We can spend...
Christmas together.
It is one week early, but...
I could hear the beating of our hearts.
I am going with my mom to Tokyo.
